name: Maiden's Fading Beauty
title: Crowd of Bouquets: Maiden's Fading Beauty
desc: "...As time passed, fewer and fewer courters visited her with flowers. What did it matter? For her, time had already stopped long ago on that fateful day."
in_play_description: After the character to which this is attached receives healing from a source other than an Artifact: Heal the most damaged character on your side for 1 HP (Twice per Round)

skills.desc:
After the character to which this is attached receives healing from a source other than an Artifact: Heal the most damaged character on your side for 1 HP (Can be triggered up to twice per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
